casebody.data:
William C. STUCKEY
v.
Seth RILEY and Barbara Pierson Riley
v.
William E. Stuckey, Dianna P. Stuckey, Dawn Stuckey and Dianna D. Stuckey Petition of: William C. Stuckey No. 477 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 4, 2019

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 4th day of February, 2019, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
